item.title: Winds of change
item.author: karl.hepworth@gmail.com (Karl Hepworth)
item.description: .navbar-custom { background: #6fb3ff; border-color: #6fb3ff; } .navbar-custom .navbar-brand, .navbar-custom .nav li a { color: #1a1a1a; } After beginning work with my previous mentor, I have truly thrived in automation, developer tooling, command line and command line tools and have undertaken a broad and now well crafted toolchain. In addition to fields of work, I’ve become much more experienced in Drupal, Node.js & JavaScript, Ruby, Java, and a few others including my favourite - Go.
